Description.Text:
Position At 500 m from the shore of the lake and the town center of Passignano, the Club Hotel Villa Paradiso is situated in an ideal location, just 30 km from Perugia and 45 from Assisi, like many other famous cities of central Italy, are reached with ease.
Restaurant Guests at the Villa Paradiso Village can choose among bed and breakfast, half board or full board arrangement.
More Informations The Hotel Villa Paradiso Village has a large swimming pool for adults and a children's pool, both equipped with deckchairs. The bar and dining room, both refined and bright, are inserted into a pleasant and distinctive environment. Guests also free Wi-Fi in the lobby.
